solution_line_template: They have played {total_games} total games because {archibald_wins} + {brother_wins} = <<{archibald_wins}+{brother_wins}={total_games}>>{total_games}
The proportion won by Archibald is {archibald_proportion} because {archibald_wins} / {total_games} = <<{archibald_wins}/{total_games}={archibald_proportion}>>{archibald_proportion}
The percentage he has won in {archibald_percent}% because {archibald_proportion} x {percent_multiplier}% = {archibald_percent}%
